name: Scion of Ugin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Martyred for worshipping her ancestors, she now walks among them.

name: Arashin Foremost
oracle_text: Double strike
Whenever Arashin Foremost enters the battlefield or attacks, another target Warrior creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I would gladly give my life if it would inspire my clan to victory."

name: Artful Maneuver
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Aven Sunstriker
oracle_text: Flying
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Megamorph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Aven Tactician
oracle_text: Flying
When Aven Tactician enters the battlefield, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The aven are admired, for they are able to fly with the dragons.

name: Battle Mastery
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text:
"There is elegance in all the Ojutai do—even their killing."
—Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

name: Center Soul
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Champion of Arashin
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "The blood of Dromoka and the blood of my veins are the same."

name: Dragon Hunter
oracle_text: Protection from Dragons
Dragon Hunter can block Dragons as though it had reach.
flavor_text: "Dromoka has taught me the secrets of her kind, that I might use them in her service."

name: Dragon's Eye Sentry
oracle_text: Defender, first strike
flavor_text: Even the humblest guard of Ojutai's strongholds ponders the puzzles of the Great Teacher's lessons.

name: Dromoka Captain
oracle_text: First strike
Whenever Dromoka Captain attacks, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "We fight not out of fear, but for honor."

name: Dromoka Dunecaster
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor_text: "The dragonlords rule the tempests of the skies. Here in the wastes, the storms are mine to command."

name: Dromoka Warrior
flavor_text: Dromoka has regard for the humans who serve under her. In return for her protection, they obey with steadfast loyalty, acting as weapons for her and her scalelords against the other clans.

name: Echoes of the Kin Tree
oracle_text: {2}{W}: Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Even after Anafenza was executed, many secretly maintained their beliefs in the old ways.

name: Enduring Victory
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"My dragonlord is immortal. Most dragons are not."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Fate Forgotten
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: When Sarkhan saved Ugin in Tarkir's past, it changed Tarkir's future. The Sultai no longer exist, having been supplanted by the dragonlord Silumgar and his clan.

name: Glaring Aegis
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Glaring Aegis enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

name: Gleam of Authority
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on other creatures you control.
Enchanted creature has vigilance and "{W}, {T}: Bolster 1." (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Graceblade Artisan
oracle_text: Graceblade Artisan gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
flavor_text:
"Can you catch a snowflake on the edge of your blade? Her sword has snagged an entire blizzard."
—Zogye, Ojutai mystic

name: Great Teacher's Decree
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Herald of Dromoka
oracle_text: Vigilance
Other Warrior creatures you control have vigilance.
flavor_text: The trumpeters of Arashin are ever alert in their watch over the Great Aerie.

name: Hidden Dragonslayer
oracle_text: Lifelink
Megamorph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Hidden Dragonslayer is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater an opponent controls.

name: Lightwalker
oracle_text: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Misthoof Kirin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
Megamorph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: It heralded Sarkhan's return to Tarkir's present.

name: Myth Realized
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Myth Realized.
{2}{W}: Put a lore counter on Myth Realized.

{W}: Until end of turn, Myth Realized becomes a Monk Avatar creature in addition to its other types and gains "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lore counters on it."

name: Ojutai Exemplars
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one —
• Tap target creature.
• Ojutai Exemplars gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn.
• Exile Ojutai Exemplars, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

name: Orator of Ojutai
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Defender, flying
When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text:
"If I fight, I might step on a butterfly. That would be sad."
—Krowg of Qal Sisma

name: Profound Journey
oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Radiant Purge
oracle_text: Exile target multicolored creature or multicolored enchantment.
flavor_text: The Shifting Wastes are Dromoka's domain. She will not tolerate intruders.

name: Resupply
oracle_text: You gain 6 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If the scalelords are the brains of Dromoka's army, the supply caravans are its beating heart."
—Baihir, Dromoka mage

name: Sandcrafter Mage
oracle_text: When Sandcrafter Mage enters the battlefield, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: With heat, sand can form a delicate work of art; with pressure, an impenetrable bulwark.

name: Sandstorm Charger
oracle_text: Megamorph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"May our foes choke upon its horns!"
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Scale Blessing
oracle_text: Bolster 1, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"Your bravery honors us all."
—Dromoka, translated from Draconic

name: Secure the Wastes
oracle_text: Create X 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"The Shifting Wastes provide our clan eternal protection. It is our duty to return the favor."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Shieldhide Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
Megamorph {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Shieldhide Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

name: Silkwrap
oracle_text: When Silkwrap enters the battlefield, exile target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less an opponent controls until Silkwrap leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
flavor_text: Better scarves than scars.

name: Strongarm Monk
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"His companions are wise to follow him, for his foes dare not stand in his way."
—Zhiada, Dirgur protector

name: Student of Ojutai
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

name: Sunscorch Regent
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Surge of Righteousness
oracle_text: Destroy target black or red creature that's attacking or blocking. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Though she stood alone, she struck with the force of an army.

name: Territorial Roc
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Such lesser creatures must be purged from the sky. What use do they have but to help channel the lightning of our mighty dragonlord?"
—Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

name: Ancient Carp
flavor_text:
"Why eat now what could one day grow into a feast?"
—Ojutai, translated from Draconic

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "When I have meditated on all outcomes, my opponent has no recourse."

name: Belltoll Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, hexproof
Megamorph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Belltoll Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

name: Blessed Reincarnation
oracle_text: Exile target creature an opponent controls. That player reveals cards from the top of their library until a creature card is revealed. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Clone Legion
oracle_text: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
flavor_text: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

name: Contradict
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Those who question Ojutai may not like the answers they receive.

name: Dance of the Skywise
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue Dragon Illusion with base power and toughness 4/4, loses all abilities, and gains flying.
flavor_text: The Ojutai believe in the Great Wheel: those who best serve the dragonlord are destined to be reborn as dragons.

name: Dirgur Nemesis
oracle_text: Defender
Megamorph {6}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Dragonlord's Prerogative
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, this spell can't be countered.
Draw four cards.

name: Elusive Spellfist
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Elusive Spellfist gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Learn to see an obstacle from a new perspective. Underneath, for example."
—Chanyi, Ojutai monk

name: Encase in Ice
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant red or green creature
When Encase in Ice enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Glint
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Rakshasa waste no opportunity to display their wealth and power, even in the midst of a sorcerous duel.

name: Gudul Lurker
oracle_text: Gudul Lurker can't be blocked.
Megamorph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The small are mostly ignored by dragons.

name: Gurmag Drowner
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Gurmag Drowner exploits a creature, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

name: Icefall Regent
oracle_text: Flying
When Icefall Regent enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Icefall Regent.
Spells your opponents cast that target Icefall Regent cost {2} more to cast.

name: Illusory Gains
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, attach Illusory Gains to that creature.

name: Learn from the Past
oracle_text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I've been told my whole life that the great Ojutai holds all knowledge, but I wonder what our forebears knew."
—Narset

name: Living Lore
oracle_text: As Living Lore enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Living Lore's power and toughness are each equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost.
Whenever Living Lore deals combat damage, you may sacrifice it. If you do, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

name: Mirror Mockery
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature. Exile that token at end of combat.
flavor_text: Who you are constantly runs toward who you will be.

name: Monastery Loremaster
oracle_text: Megamorph {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Monastery Loremaster is turned face up, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Mystic Meditation
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a creature card.
flavor_text:
"Still the mind and quiet the heart. Only then will you hear the Multiverse's great truths."
—Narset

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text:
"You cannot be an Ojutai monk. They prize wisdom and skill, and you have neither."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Ojutai Interceptor
oracle_text: Flying
Megamorph {3}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "Though I may soar, I could never fly as high as the dragons."

name: Ojutai's Breath
oracle_text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Ojutai's Summons
oracle_text: Create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Palace Familiar
oracle_text: Flying
When Palace Familiar dies, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The most profound secrets lie in the darkest places of the world. It can be prudent to make use of another set of eyes."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Profaner of the Dead
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Profaner of the Dead exploits a creature, return to their owners' hands all creatures your opponents control with toughness less than the exploited creature's toughness.

oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast a face-down creature spell, pay a mana cost to turn a manifested creature face up, or pay a morph cost. (A megamorph cost is a morph cost.)

name: Reduce in Stature
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2.
flavor_text: A dragon learns humility only in the moments before its death.

{1}: Shorecrasher Elemental gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi's Faithful exploits a creature, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "I tire of your prattle, and your face."

oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.

name: Taigam's Strike

name: Updraft Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"It slips through the smallest cracks in the mountain, emerging whole and unfettered. There is nowhere it cannot go, for what can hold back the air itself?"
—Chanyi, Ojutai monk

name: Void Squall
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Youthful Scholar
oracle_text: When Youthful Scholar dies, draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Too dumb, and you end up a sibsig. Too smart, and you end up a meal. Mediocrity is the key to a long life."
—Mogai, Silumgar noble

name: Zephyr Scribe
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Zephyr Scribe.
flavor_text:
"Ojutai's rule has allowed Tarkir's monks to learn from the truly enlightened."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Acid-Spewer Dragon

When Acid-Spewer Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

name: Ambuscade Shaman
oracle_text: Whenever Ambuscade Shaman or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Blood-Chin Fanatic
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another Warrior creature: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor_text: "We are as brutal as our dragonlord. We strike like wild lightning and feast on human flesh."

name: Blood-Chin Rager
oracle_text: Whenever Blood-Chin Rager attacks, Warrior creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: Kolaghan blades rarely stay clean for long.

name: Butcher's Glee
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Coat with Venom
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."
—Xathi the Infallible

name: Corpseweft
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped X/X black Zombie Horror creature token, where X is twice the number of cards exiled this way.
flavor_text: Sidisi hated to limit her options.

name: Damnable Pact
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
flavor_text:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Deadly Wanderings
oracle_text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch and lifelink.
flavor_text:
"Seclusion is only an option for the strong."
—Sorin Markov

name: Death Wind
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I am a dragonslayer for Lord Silumgar. There is no dragon save him whom I fear."
—Xathi the Infallible

name: Deathbringer Regent
oracle_text: Flying
When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

name: Defeat
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"Wars are decided one life at a time."
—Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Sarkhan was eager to take vengeance on Zurgo until he saw how lowly his old foe had become.

name: Dutiful Attendant
oracle_text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.

name: Flatten
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like their dragonlord, the Kolaghan take no trophies. They find true fulfillment only in the battle itself, in clash of steel and thunder of hooves.

name: Foul Renewal
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the toughness of the card returned this way.
flavor_text: The cycle of life and death is rarely pretty.

name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, you gain 4 life.

name: Foul-Tongue Shriek
oracle_text: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.
flavor_text: Foul-Tongue shamans draw their powers from a dark twisting of the Draconic language.

name: Gravepurge
oracle_text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Lord Silumgar has given you a second chance to please him."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Hand of Silumgar
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Silumgar trains those whom he favors in his magic, granting them the ability to spread his disdain across the land.

name: Hedonist's Trove
oracle_text: When Hedonist's Trove enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target opponent's graveyard.
You may play land cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove.
You may cast nonland cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove. You can't cast more than one spell this way each turn.

name: Kolaghan Skirmisher

flavor_text: Kolaghan's army rushes from kill to kill, desperate to avoid the dragon's wrath.

name: Marang River Skeleton

Megamorph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The gurgling of the Marang conceals both footsteps and screams.

name: Marsh Hulk
oracle_text: Megamorph {6}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Now vengeance is his sole purpose.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"The Ojutai are my favorite victims. They have so much knowledge to lose."
—Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

name: Minister of Pain
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Minister of Pain exploits a creature, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Draconic words need not be shouted. A whisper will suffice.

name: Pitiless Horde
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
Dash {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Qarsi Sadist
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Qarsi Sadist exploits a creature, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Dying for the greater good still hurts.

name: Rakshasa Gravecaller
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text: Debts to rakshasa linger beyond death.

name: Reckless Imp
oracle_text: Flying
Reckless Imp can't block.
Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Risen Executioner
oracle_text: Risen Executioner can't block.
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
You may cast Risen Executioner from your graveyard if you pay {1} more to cast it for each other creature card in your graveyard.

name: Self-Inflicted Wound
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a green or white creature. If that player does, they lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Worse than watching the cruelest deed is watching it done by your own hand."
—Baihir, Dromoka mage

name: Shambling Goblin
oracle_text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle."
—Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

name: Sibsig Icebreakers
oracle_text: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"I almost envy them. They can't get frostbite."
—Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

name: Sidisi, Undead Vizier
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi, Undead Vizier exploits a creature, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Silumgar Assassin
oracle_text: Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.
Megamorph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Silumgar Assassin is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 3 or less an opponent controls.

name: Silumgar Butcher
oracle_text: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

name: Ukud Cobra
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text:
"The Silumgar hide behind the deadly wildlife of their swamps. They'd rather scheme in their jungle palaces than face us."
—Khibat, Kolaghan warrior

name: Ultimate Price
oracle_text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
flavor_text:
"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Virulent Plague
oracle_text: Creature tokens get -2/-2.
flavor_text:
"This pestilence robs us of glorious death in battle. We starve to death with full bellies and drown trying to slake our unnatural thirst."
—Kerai Hatesinger, Kolaghan warrior

name: Vulturous Aven
oracle_text: Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

name: Wandering Tombshell
flavor_text: The crumbling temples on the tortoise's back are monuments to the decadence of the ancient Sultai. Though it harkens back to the era of the khans, Silumgar allows it to walk his territory as a warning to those who would oppose him.

name: Atarka Efreet
oracle_text: Megamorph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Atarka Pummeler
oracle_text: Formidable — {3}{R}{R}: Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Berserkers' Onslaught
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
flavor_text:
"Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence."
—Arel, Unseen Whisperer

name: Commune with Lava
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

name: Crater Elemental
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Crater Elemental: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
Formidable — {2}{R}: Crater Elemental has base power 8 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

name: Descent of the Dragons
oracle_text: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Dragons emerge from tempests fully formed and terribly hungry.

name: Draconic Roar
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.

name: Dragon Tempest
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

name: Dragon Whisperer
oracle_text: {R}: Dragon Whisperer gains flying until end of turn.
{1}{R}: Dragon Whisperer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Formidable — {4}{R}{R}: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Hardened Berserker
oracle_text: Whenever Hardened Berserker attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
flavor_text:
"Just let him loose and follow the charge."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Impact Tremors
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"If their ears are to the ground, we will make them bleed!"
—Taklai, Kolaghan warrior

name: Ire Shaman
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

name: Kindled Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It is most honorable to use every part of the animals we kill . . . especially if we use them to annihilate our enemies."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Kolaghan Aspirant
oracle_text: Whenever Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by a creature, Kolaghan Aspirant deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: She answers the call of the Crave, the desire for battle sated only by bloodshed.

name: Kolaghan Forerunners
oracle_text: Trample
Kolaghan Forerunners's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Kolaghan Stormsinger
oracle_text: Haste
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Kolaghan Stormsinger is turned face up, target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Lightning Berserker
oracle_text: {R}: Lightning Berserker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Dash {R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Lose Calm
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: A lifetime of discipline forsaken in a moment of rage.

name: Magmatic Chasm
oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Our shamans assert their mastery over the land, thwarting the lesser clans' attempts to stand in the way of our dragonlord."
—Allek, Atarka hunter

name: Qal Sisma Behemoth
oracle_text: Qal Sisma Behemoth can't attack or block unless you pay {2}.
flavor_text:
"It hunts grand game for Atarka, and when the time comes, it will become a mighty feast."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Rending Volley
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.
flavor_text: The sky offers few hiding places.

name: Roast
oracle_text: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw."
—Ulnok, Atarka shaman

name: Sabertooth Outrider
oracle_text: Trample
Formidable — Whenever Sabertooth Outrider attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Sabertooth Outrider gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Sarkhan's Rage
oracle_text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

name: Sarkhan's Triumph
oracle_text: Search your library for a Dragon creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Sarkhan gazed on the world around him, the dragons sweeping through its skies, and joy kindled like a fire in his soul.

name: Screamreach Brawler
oracle_text: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
flavor_text: "My dragonlord's lightning will dance upon your bones!"

name: Seismic Rupture
oracle_text: Seismic Rupture deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: The shaman opened the earth beneath their feet, trapping the survivors within the crevices of Ayagor for Atarka to devour at her leisure.

name: Sprinting Warbrute
oracle_text: Sprinting Warbrute attacks each combat if able.
Dash {3}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Stormcrag Elemental
oracle_text: Trample
Megamorph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The storms of Tarkir awaken more than dragons.

name: Stormwing Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
Megamorph {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Stormwing Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

name: Summit Prowler
flavor_text:
"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Tail Slash
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"Kneel before a dragon and you will be spared when it turns to leave."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Thunderbreak Regent
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, Thunderbreak Regent deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Attracting a dragon's attention may be the last mistake you make.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: A mocking laughter echoed in Ugin's mind. How many centuries had he slumbered, stricken, while Nicol Bolas moved unchallenged among the planes?

name: Twin Bolt
oracle_text: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor_text: Kolaghan archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They utilize their dragonlord's lightning to strike their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

name: Vandalize
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"As we have learned from Kolaghan, to ruin is to rule."
—Shensu, Kolaghan rider

name: Volcanic Rush
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The bravest warriors take the shortest path to victory, whatever that path may be."
—Sakta, Atarka hunter

name: Volcanic Vision
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

name: Warbringer
oracle_text: Dash costs you pay cost {2} less (as long as this creature is on the battlefield).
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Zurgo Bellstriker
oracle_text: Zurgo Bellstriker can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Aerie Bowmasters
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Megamorph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Ainok Artillerist
oracle_text: Ainok Artillerist has reach as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"In the Tarkir I once knew, the Abzan revered their ancestor trees. Now, as Dromoka, they cut their finest groves to make weapons."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Ainok Survivalist
oracle_text: Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

name: Assault Formation
oracle_text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
{G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
{2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Atarka Beastbreaker
oracle_text: Formidable — {4}{G}: Atarka Beastbreaker gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor_text: He scorns the heavy winter garb of lesser warriors, trusting his anger to keep him warm.

name: Avatar of the Resolute
oracle_text: Reach, trample
Avatar of the Resolute enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: It exemplifies the ideals of the Dromoka: strength, unity, and honor.

name: Circle of Elders
oracle_text: Vigilance
Formidable — {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor_text: They whisper of an ancient hero who saved the dragons of their world.

name: Collected Company
oracle_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Many can stand where one would fall.

name: Colossodon Yearling
flavor_text: The colossodon's hard outer shell stops many predators, but with a gentle flip from a dragon, it quickly becomes a meal in a bowl.

name: Conifer Strider
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Atarka's presence thaws the glaciers of Qal Sisma, forcing its elementals to migrate or adapt.

name: Deathmist Raptor
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you may return Deathmist Raptor from your graveyard to the battlefield face up or face down.
Megamorph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Den Protector
oracle_text: Creatures with power less than Den Protector's power can't block it.
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Den Protector is turned face up, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Display of Dominance
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target blue or black noncreature permanent.
• Permanents you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells your opponents control this turn.

name: Dragon-Scarred Bear
oracle_text: Formidable — {1}{G}: Regenerate Dragon-Scarred Bear. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor_text: Bears are a delicacy for the Atarka. The few that remain are the toughest of their species.

name: Dromoka's Gift
oracle_text: Bolster 4. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text: The simplest gift from a dragon can be a revered accolade for a human warrior.

name: Epic Confrontation
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

name: Explosive Vegetation
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Despite the flames and devastation of the dragons, Tarkir continued to thrive.

name: Foe-Razer Regent
oracle_text: Flying
When Foe-Razer Regent enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.
Whenever a creature you control fights, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Glade Watcher
oracle_text: Defender
Formidable — {G}: Glade Watcher can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

name: Guardian Shield-Bearer
oracle_text: Megamorph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Guardian Shield-Bearer is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

name: Herdchaser Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, trample
Megamorph {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Herdchaser Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

name: Inspiring Call
oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

name: Lurking Arynx
oracle_text: Formidable — {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Lurking Arynx this turn if able. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
flavor_text: Once it has your scent, it will hunt you from the Gurmag Swamp to Ayagor.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The remains of ancient civilizations litter the run-down land.

name: Obscuring Aether
oracle_text: Face-down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Turn Obscuring Aether face down. (It becomes a 2/2 creature.)

name: Pinion Feast
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text:
"Even paradise is not without tragedies."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Press the Advantage
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Show your enemies as much mercy as they would show you."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Revealing Wind
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You may look at each face-down creature that's attacking or blocking.
flavor_text:
"The sands obscure the vision of others, but clarify ours."

name: Salt Road Ambushers
oracle_text: Whenever another permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.

flavor_text: The list of things a krotiq eats is as long as the krotiq itself.

name: Servant of the Scale
oracle_text: Servant of the Scale enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Servant of the Scale dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Servant of the Scale.

name: Shaman of Forgotten Ways
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Formidable — {9}{G}{G}, {T}: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures they control. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

name: Shape the Sands
oracle_text: Target creature gets +0/+5 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Dragons in flight seldom expect company."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Sheltered Aerie
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."
flavor_text: Dromoka's scalelords patrol the skies over Arashin, offering her people safety from the harsh world.

name: Sight of the Scalelords
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Silumgar creep around our borders and infiltrate our aeries. We must remain ever watchful."

name: Stampeding Elk Herd

flavor_text: The Atarka use them not just for food, but also to clear away snow, trees, and enemy forces.

name: Sunbringer's Touch

name: Surrak, the Hunt Caller
oracle_text: Formidable — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The greatest honor is to feed Atarka."

name: Tread Upon
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Boasting impenetrable defenses only draws the most tenacious of attackers."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Arashin Sovereign
oracle_text: Flying
When Arashin Sovereign dies, you may put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Dromoka dragons foster trust among their subjects, while the other clans must spend their time quelling rebellion.

name: Atarka's Command

• Your opponents can't gain life this turn.

name: Boltwing Marauder

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: When battling the Kolaghan, consider yourself lucky if lightning strikes the same place only twice.

name: Cunning Breezedancer
oracle_text: Flying

flavor_text:
"That which is beautiful in form can also be deadly."
—Ishai, Ojutai dragonspeaker

name: Dragonlord Atarka
oracle_text: Flying, trample
When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.

name: Dragonlord Dromoka
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Flying, lifelink
Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.
flavor_text: Dromoka's followers forsake blood ties so that they may join a greater family.

name: Dragonlord Kolaghan
oracle_text: Flying, haste
Other creatures you control have haste.
Whenever an opponent casts a creature or planeswalker spell with the same name as a card in their graveyard, that player loses 10 life.

name: Dragonlord Ojutai
oracle_text: Flying
Dragonlord Ojutai has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
Whenever Dragonlord Ojutai deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Dragonlord Silumgar
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch
When Dragonlord Silumgar enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Dragonlord Silumgar.
flavor_text: Silumgar never passes up an opportunity to add to his opulence.

name: Dromoka's Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn.
• Target player sacrifices an enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

name: Enduring Scalelord
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.
flavor_text: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

name: Harbinger of the Hunt
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{R}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
{2}{G}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each other creature with flying.
flavor_text: An Atarka dragon's exhale cooks what its inhale consumes.

name: Kolaghan's Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target player discards a card.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Kolaghan's Command deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Narset Transcendent
oracle_text: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
−2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, it gains rebound.
−9: You get an emblem with "Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells."

name: Necromaster Dragon
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Necromaster Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token and each opponent puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

name: Ojutai's Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• You gain 4 life.
• Counter target creature spell.
• Draw a card.

name: Pristine Skywise
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: The elite of Ojutai's brood, the skywise see their enemies as puzzles to be solved.

name: Ruthless Deathfang
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts."
—Silumgar, translated from Draconic

name: Sarkhan Unbroken
oracle_text: +1: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color.
−2: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
−8: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Savage Ventmaw
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

name: Silumgar's Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

name: Swift Warkite
oracle_text: Flying

When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Ancestral Statue
oracle_text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.

name: Atarka Monument
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Atarka is worshipped and fed by her subjects at Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl.

name: Custodian of the Trove
oracle_text: Defender
Custodian of the Trove enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Silumgar delights in repurposing the treasures of other clans to serve his own ravenous greed.

name: Dragonloft Idol
oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, Dragonloft Idol gets +1/+1 and has flying and trample.
flavor_text: The idols were forged during the time of the Khanfall, when the dragons came to rule Tarkir and its people aligned themselves with the five dragonlords.

name: Dromoka Monument

flavor_text: Dromoka rules her clan from the Great Aerie atop Arashin, the central city of the Shifting Wastes.

flavor_text: Designed by an ancient artificer, the vials are strong enough to hold the very breath of a dragon—until it's needed.
